title: Here's Everything You Need To Know About The "Quiet Quitting" Trend
description:
There's a new trend that is starting to become more common in the work place. It's called "quiet quitting." Basically people in the work place are prioritizing their at-home life over giving their all to their job without the proper recognition.
We discuss...
